mapper.select: SELECT o.*, u.nickname AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, s.name AS setmealName, h.name AS hospitalName, d.name AS doctorName FROM orders o LEFT JOIN user u ON o.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN setmeal s ON o.setmeal_id = s.id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON o.hospital_id = h.id LEFT JOIN doctor d ON o.doctor_id = d.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
